bibl.title: Bishops in the Papyri.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: MORRIS, Royce L.B.

bibl.note: This study has as a focal point three specific areas as they relate to bishops in the papyri: 1) names, 2) secular functions, 3) and the increasing use of adjectives to express non-secular perceptions of bishops. - Pp. 585-587: Appendix 1.
